abstract.t: The Point-to-Point Protocol (PPP)provides a standard method for transporting multi-protocol datagrams over point-to-point links. This document describes the use of PPP over Integrated Services Digital Network (ISDN) switched circuits.
This document is the product of the Point-to-Point Protocol Working Group of the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF). Comments should be submitted to the ietf-ppp@merit.edu mailing list.
